product_name: GoPro HERO4 Black Camera - Surf/SUP/Kayak Edition
long_description: Boasting twice the processing power and video frame rate speeds of the Hero3, the HERO4 Black Surf Package let's you snag stunning POV action shots directly from your surfboard, paddle board or kayak.
short_description: Boasting twice the processing power and video frame rate speeds of the Hero3, the HERO4 Black Surf Package let's you snag stunning POV action shots directly from your surfboard, paddle board or kayak.
